articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Togo
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Togo
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Selom Komi Klassou on his reappointment as prime minister of the Republic of Togo on Aug. 12.
					 The message wished him bigger success in his work for the economic development of the country and happiness of its people, expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would invariably develop.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho also sent a congratulatory message to Robert Dussey upon his reappointment as minister of Foreign Affairs, Cooperation and African Integration of Togo.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Hits out at Germany's Projected Sale of Missiles to S. Korea
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Hits out at Germany's Projected Sale of Missiles to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Sunday as regards Germany's projected delivery of attack missiles to south Korea:
					 There are reports that Germany will deliver Taurus air-to-surface missiles capable of accurately hitting the strategic bases of the DPRK within this year.
					
					 If it is true, Germany's projected delivery disregarding even its domestic law banning arms export to dispute-torn areas will disturb peace and escalate tensions on the Korean peninsula, the biggest hot spot in the world.
					
					 In the past Germany sold Patriot interceptor missiles and diesel engine submarines to south Korea. Its unhesitating delivery of even attack missiles to south Korea will only result in inciting the south Korean authorities getting desperate in confrontation with the compatriots in the north to a new war.
					
					 Germany has talked more than any others that it hopes for "stability" and "peace" on the Korean peninsula as it made apologies repeatedly for inflicting untold disasters upon humankind by igniting two world wars and experienced the pain resulting from national division.
					
					 However, it is now making no scruple of doing an action inciting a war.
					
					It is, indeed, preposterous for it to term the DPRK's self-defensive steps for defending its sovereignty, vital rights of the nation and regional peace "violations of resolutions" of the UN Security Council, while selling even attack missiles to south Korea in defiance of its domestic law.
					
					 Germany will have to have courage to answer the question as to whether the UNSC's resolution terming weapon test "threat to world peace and security" is fair or not.
					
					 If it wants to shoulder "heavier responsibility" in the international arena, it will have to discreetly behave with a right viewpoint on the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The projected sale of missiles should be retracted at once as it will wreck peace on the Korean peninsula and other parts of the region.

articles.title: Joint Press Release
articles.content:
Joint Press Release
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The north side preparatory committee, the south side group for promotion planning and the overseas side preparatory committee for the joint conference of political parties, organizations and individual personages of the north, the south and abroad for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula released a joint press release on August 12.
					 The joint press release said:
					
					 A working-level meeting of the north side preparatory committee, the south side group for promotion planning and the overseas side preparatory committee for the joint conference of political parties, organizations and individual personages of the north, the south and abroad for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula was held in Shenyang, China on August 11 and 12.
					
					 The meeting had a frank discussion of the present orientation of the activities for successfully holding the joint conference which is the great national conference for reunification, the joint conference of highest form proposed by the north side, and the issues of the joint national event and those of opening the football match between the workers of the north and the south for reunification for marking the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation and gathering of people of all social strata for reunification.
					
					 The participants shared the understanding that the joint conference which was agreed to be held to mark the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation was not held owing to the obstructive moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad but it was the most rational way of defending peace and security on the Korean peninsula, improving the north-south relations and opening a new way out for national reunification and the proposal of great historical significance.
					
					 The meeting agreed to make positive efforts to hold the joint conference in the north, the south and abroad as an immediate task and decided to organize the all-nation joint preparatory committee depending on the formation of the south side preparatory committee.
					
					 It also decided to conduct activities for successfully holding the joint conference in various forms and ways to suit the specific conditions.
					
					 Delegations of the north, south and overseas which took part in the meeting expressed deep concern and regret at the fact that the joint conference, the August 15 event common to the nation and the football match were not held due to the disapproval of the south side authorities, and decided to conduct vigorous activities for normalizing contact and visit among the north, the south and abroad.
					
					 The north, the south and abroad agreed to actively discuss and promote the issues of fully realizing the gathering and contact for reunification including the joint conference as desired by all the compatriots while keeping in close touch with each other for consultation.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Sunday on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 She laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests including a member of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the British Labor Party and his companion visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 The guests paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Grand Chorus of School Youth and Children Given in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Grand Chorus of School Youth and Children Given in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A grand chorus "Mt. Paektu and Youth Power" was given by school youth and children in Pyongyang City at the Kim Il Sung Square on Sunday to mark the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The performance began with the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung."
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as grand chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and kayagum ensemble "Nilliri for Songun".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats of President Kim Il Sung who defeated the Japanese imperialists and accomplished the historic cause of Korea's liberation by leading the 20-year-long arduous anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory.
					
					 Such numbers as narration and grand chorus "General of Korea" and male solo "General, Here Is the Forefront" reflected the boundless reverence for leader Kim Jong Il who made a long tour of Songun till the last moments of his revolutionary life.
					
					 Grand choruses such as revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung" represented the strong spirit of the new generation who will vigorously advance toward the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution pioneered on Mt. Paektu under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding aloft the red flag of Juche associated with the lives of the great leaders.
					
					 Officials concerned, officials of the youth league and youth and students in Pyongyang watched the performance.

articles.title: Monument to Three Charters for National Reunification
articles.content:
Monument to Three Charters for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- It has been fifteen years since the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification was completed on August 14, Juche 90 (2001) in Thongil Street in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 The monument, covering an area of over 100,000 square meters, represents the ardent desire and steadfast will of the Korean nation to reunify the country, guided by the three charters.
					
					 More than 1.3 million people visited the monument for fifteen years, O Myong Hui, director of the monument, told KCNA, and went on:
					
					 At least 1 700 south Korean and overseas Koreans' organizations visited the monument. 
					
					 The monument is 30 meters high and 61.5 meters wide. The figure three means the Three Charters for National Reunification and 61.5 the day on which the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was signed.
					
					 It is consisted of well-trimmed granite sculptures depicting two women in Korean costume with their hands holding up the emblem of the three charters. Embossed on the emblem are letters "Three Charters", the Korean map and magnolia in full blossom.
					
					 There are groups of subsidiary theme sculptures divided into parts of the Three Principle of National Reunification, a proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, the Ten-point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation and the hurrah for Korean reunification at the platforms of the tower.
					
					 Exhibited in the monument are rare stones donated by party and state leaders of different countries, world progressives and overseas Koreans.
					
					 There is also the monument to President Kim Il Sung's proposition on reunification which calls on all Koreans to get united as one in the principle of great national unity, irrespective of differences in ideology, political view and religious belief.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il initiated the construction of the monument and wisely led it to completion. 
					
					 Now the monument encourages the reunification movement of all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to open up a broad avenue to reunification under the banner of the Three Charters for National Reunification.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Korea's Liberation
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- It has been 71 years since Korea was liberated from Japan's colonial rule (August 15, 1945). 
					 On this occasion, the Korean people recall with deep emotion the feats President Kim Il Sung performed for the country's liberation.
					
					 He formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union in his teens and founded the new-type revolutionary armed forces to wage a 20 year-long revolutionary war against the Japanese imperialists, styling themselves the leader of Asia, with neither state-backing home front nor assistance of a regular army.
					
					 During the war, he led battles against the enemies to victory with superb guerrilla tactics while arousing patriotic forces of all strata to a sacred war for national liberation.
					
					 After liberating the country, he built a new democratic country in Korea, defeated the U.S. forces, boasting of the myth of its mightiness in the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War and built a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence. 
					
					 The exploits he performed for the country's liberation was creditably adhered to and glorified by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He turned the area of Mt. Paektu into a great sanctuary for education in the revolutionary tradition to imbue the servicepersons and people of the DPRK with the spirit of Mt. Paektu. And he defended the nation's dignity and laid a firm foundation for building a thriving nation with the might of the Paektusan army.
					
					 Now, the sacred lifeline of the Korean revolution is reliably carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un who instills into the minds of all the servicepersons and people the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Moving to Cook up Triangular Military Alliance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Moving to Cook up Triangular Military Alliance
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities are strengthening military collusion with outside forces for invading the north under the pretence of "coping with missile threat." A few days ago, the south Korean warmongers had a confab with their U.S. and Japanese masters for sharing "information on missiles of the north."
					 This is the revelation of the invariable bad habit of escalating confrontation and making a sinister attempt to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north in collusion with outsiders and the traitorous act of fully joining in the moves to cook up the triangular military alliance for aggression, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the long-sought scenario of the U.S. to bind south Korea and Japan under the triangular military alliance and use them as a shock brigade in implementing its hostile policy toward the DPRK and realize the ambition for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. moves to cook up the triangular military alliance will entail very dangerous consequences disturbing peace and stability and creating and escalating the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park Geun Hye group is actively joining in the moves to cook up the U.S.-led triangular military alliance in a bid to hurt the compatriots in the north backed by outside forces.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the south Korean authorities' sharing "information on missiles of the north" with the U.S. and Japan is being pushed forward, timed to coincide with the moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is the group of unpardonable traitors as it joins hands with the U.S. and Japan, sworn enemies of the Korean nation, to stifle the compatriots in the north and brings miserable disasters to the Korean nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Women Demand Nullification of Humiliating "Agreement" with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Women Demand Nullification of Humiliating "Agreement" with Japan
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Members of the women's committee of the Minju Party of south Korea and lawmakers belonging to the women and families committee of the "National Assembly" made public a joint statement on August 10 in demand of the nullification of the humiliating "agreement" with Japan, according to a south Korean internet paper.
					 The statement said the "government" would face stronger protest if it receives money from the Japanese government under the pretext of establishment of a "foundation."
					
					 It urged the authorities to stop operation of the "reconciliation and recovery foundation" and renegotiate the issue of the sexual slavery with the Japanese government.
					
					 It also urged Japan to make a sincere apology for the sexual slavery and take legal responsibility and put forward a concrete proposal for probing the truth behind it and for proper education in history.

articles.title: Teachers Union Suppressed in South Korea
articles.content:
Teachers Union Suppressed in South Korea
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities are intensifying suppression of the Teachers Union, according to CBS of south Korea on Aug. 12.
					The Seoul Southern District Court respectively fined the trade union and its former chairman on charges of not revising the regulation which allowed the sacked teachers to accede to the trade union.

articles.title: Sixth Congress of General Association of Koreans in China Held
articles.content:
Sixth Congress of General Association of Koreans in China Held
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Sixth Congress of the General Association of Koreans in China took place in Shenyang of China on August 10.
					 The congress discussed the three agenda items "On the work done by the General Association of Koreans in China during the period under review and its tasks", "On the amendment to rules of the General Association of Koreans in China" and "On the election of the guiding organ of the General Association of Koreans in China."
					
					 Chairwoman of the association Choe Un Bok made a report on the first agenda item.
					
					 She referred to the successes made by the association in the patriotic work for strengthening the organization and contributing to the building of a powerful socialist country in the homeland and accomplishing the cause of reunification in the period under review.
					
					 She raised the tasks to be carried out in consolidating the association.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The congress discussed the amendment to the rules of the association and elections of its guiding organ.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted there.
					
					 The letter evinced the pledge to thoroughly embody the indomitable fighting spirit and traits of the people in the homeland in overall work and bring about a drastic turn in strengthening the association and in the patriotic movement for reunification.
					
					 On August 9, there were a ceremony of awarding state commendations to merited officials and core civilians, photo, book and fine art exhibition and art performance.

articles.title: Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Russia
articles.content:
Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Russia
 Moscow, August 13 (KCNA) -- A tablet to honor leader Kim Jong Il was unveiled at the Museum of the Piskaryov Cemetery in Sankt-Peterburg City on August 12 on the 15th anniversary of his historic visit to the Russian Federation with due ceremony.
					 Present at the ceremony were the manager and employees of the cemetery and personages of different units, the DPRK ambassador to Russia and officials of the DPRK working there.
					
					 The tablet was unveiled by the manager of the cemetery and the DPRK ambassador.

articles.title: Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Kirov Plant, Russia
articles.content:
Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Kirov Plant, Russia
 Moscow, August 13 (KCNA) -- A tablet to honor leader Kim Jong Il was unveiled with due ceremony at the Kirov Plant of Russia on August 11 on the 15th anniversary of his historic visit to the Russian Federation.
					 On display at the venue of the ceremony were photos showing Kim Jong Il's visit to the Russian Federation and revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also photos introducing the stirring reality of the rapidly developing DPRK.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were the vice general manager of the Kirov Plant, the ex-mayor of Sankt-Peterburg City, personages of different social standings, the DPRK ambassador to Russia and DPRK officials working there.
					
					 The tablet was unveiled by the vice general manager of the plant and the DPRK ambassador.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the tablet. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Polish Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Polish Website
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions For National Reunification" was posted on the Polish website "DPRK" on Aug. 9.
					 The work published on Aug. 4, Juche 86 (1997) deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 It formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and indicates the tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification on the basis of it.

articles.title: Seminar on Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu Held in Malaysia
articles.content:
Seminar on Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu Held in Malaysia
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un was held by a Malaysian company on Aug. 9 with the approach of the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation and the Day of Songun.
					 Introduced at the seminar were the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung in liberating the country, his Songun leadership exploits and eye-opening events being registered by the army and people of the DPRK in the building of a powerful socialist country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Anniversary Marked in Mali, Nigeria
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Anniversary Marked in Mali, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- There took place a reading session at a school of Mali and a film show at a Koryo healthcare center in Nigeria on Aug. 8 and 9 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The principal of the school of Mali said that Aug. 15, 1945 was the day of historical turn for the Korean people, adding:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung achieved the historic cause of national liberation by leading to victory the 15-year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle and then founded the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK, the first people's democratic state in the East.
					
					 Therefore, Korea, once eclipsed on a world map, was able to proudly emerge as an independent and sovereign state onto the international arena.
					
					 The DPRK turned into a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, which no one dares provoke, under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Today the Korean people are dynamically stepping up the building of a powerful socialist country while meeting all challenges of the enemies, rallied close around HE Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: German Body Demands Repatriation of DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
German Body Demands Repatriation of DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on Aug. 9 sent a letter to the south Korean puppet Embassy in Germany in demand of the immediate repatriation of the DPRK citizens who were allured and kidnapped by the south Korean group of traitors.
					 The letter said:
					
					 Some months ago, the south Korean authorities kidnapped at least 10 women of the DPRK and forcibly took them to south Korea.
					
					 This has escalated the mistrust and standoff between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean regime immediately release the abductees and send them back to their families.
					
					 This is the only way of achieving reconciliation and unity between the north and the south.
					
					 We hope that the Korean people will enjoy a free and peaceful life in a reunified country.

articles.title: German Organization Denounces U.S. Moves for Germ Warfare
articles.content:
German Organization Denounces U.S. Moves for Germ Warfare
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany made public a statement on August 9 in denunciation of the outragesous moves of the U.S. imperialists to plunge the Korean nation into the holocaust of germ warfare.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Finding its racket against the DPRK proving futile by the DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrence, the U.S. is working hard to threaten the DPRK with bio-chemical weapons.
					
					 This clearly proves that the U.S. is tight-cornered in the standoff with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. scenario for germ warfare would bring to light its poor and dirty colors in the world.
					
					 The world should know that the U.S. ruling quarters loudly talking about "human rights" are brutes in human skin as they ruthlessly violate human rights.
					
					 The U.S., main source of misfortune of mankind, and their stooges deserve stern punishment of the international community and they should be thoroughly isolated internationally.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation, Event That Brought Change in People's Destiny: Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation, Event That Brought Change in People's Destiny: Nigerian Body
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Korea's liberation, turning point in history" on its website on August 9 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The article said:
					
					 Korea was liberated on August 15, 1945.
					
					 Liberation of the country helped the Korean people lead an independent and dignified life as the master of their own destiny, the master of the state and society free from the yoke of the colonial slavery by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 For the Korean people the country's liberation was not only the national rebirth but a great event that brought about a change in their destiny from slave to master.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung led the 15-year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory, achieving the historic cause of Korea's liberation.
					
					 Right after the liberation he founded the Workers' Party of Korea, organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, before anything else.
					
					 The people's power was established and all democratic reforms such as agrarian reform were successfully carried out in the northern part of Korea in a short span of time under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 This helped the people become masters of the power, factories and land and women get rid of feudal fetters that had lasted thousands of years.
					
					 The liberation helped build the socialist system centered on the popular masses, invincible socialist state unfazed by any storm on the land of Korea.
					
					 Fresh leap forward and innovations have been made one after another in the building of an economic power. This reality in the DPRK makes everyone recollect the historic meaning of Korea's liberation which brought about a turning point in carving out the independent destiny of the people and achieving the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Russian Body Praises DPRK as Youth Power
articles.content:
Russian Body Praises DPRK as Youth Power
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The All-Russia Lenin Young Communist League posted an article titled "Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and youth power" on its website on August 8 on the occasion of the Ninth Congress of the youth league.
					 The article said:
					
					 The Ninth Congress of the youth league will open soon in the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's history of building a rich and powerful country which started from naught and made leaps and bounds while racing against time would be unthinkable apart from the heroic struggle of the young people.
					
					 The young Korean people are glorifying their worthy life on the first line of confrontation with the imperialists and the U.S. and defense of socialism and in difficult and labor consuming fields of building an economic power.
					
					 It is the great pride of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to have such reliable big ranks of young people.
					
					 They cherish ardent loyalty to the Party and the leader, the spirit of devoted service to the country and people, noble sense of moral obligation for the revolutionary forerunners and comrades and beautiful traits of morality. These are peculiar to them.
					
					 The DPRK is a young country with immensely rosy future, youth power without an equal in the world.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX demanda el cese de la venta de misil de Alemania al Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX demanda el cese de la venta de misil de Alemania al Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con el intento de Alemania de vender el misil de ataque a los titeres surcoreanos, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 14 la respuesta que senala:
					Se divulgan las informaciones de que Alemania entregara en este ano al Sur de Corea el misil aire-tierra Taurus, capaz de atacar con precision las bases estrategicas de la RPDC.
					
					Si esto es verdad, el acto del pais europeo resulta el antipacifico que exacerba mas la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, region mas candente en el mundo, menospreciando hasta su ley nacional que prohibe la exportacion de armas a la zona de conflicto.
					
					En el tiempo pasado, Alemania vendio al Sur de Corea el misil interceptor Patriot y el submarino de Diesel bajo el pretexto del objeto defensivo, y ahora quiere donarle sin vacilacion hasta el misil de ataque, lo cual instigara mas las maniobras de provocacion de la nueva guerra de las autoridades surcoreanas, que se aferran a la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Alemania, que pidio disculpas en reiteradas veces por haber impuesto a la humanidad incontables calamidades durante dos guerras mundiales provocadas por ella misma y se experimentaba directamente los sufrimientos de la division, ha venido hablando con frecuencia que desea mas que nadie la "estabilidad" y la "paz" de la Peninsula Coreana. Pero, en la actualidad perpetra sin vacilacion los actos de incitar la guerra.
					
					Resulta muy absurdo que tal pais europeo acusa una tras otra las medidas autodefensivas de la RPDC para defender la soberania del pais, el derecho nacional a la existencia y la paz de la region cuestionandolas como "violacion de la resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Alemania debera tener el valor de responder a la pregunta de que es imparcial o no la "resolucion" del CS de la ONU que definio la misma prueba de las armas como la "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales".
					
					Si ella quiere asumir una "responsabilidad mayor" en la arena internacional, debera actuar con seriedad tomando el justo criterio sobre la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Tiene que interrumpir de inmediato la venta de misil al Sur de Corea que destruye la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.

articles.title: Publicado comunicado conjunto de comites preparatorios para Conferencia Conjunta
articles.content:
Publicado comunicado conjunto de comites preparatorios para Conferencia Conjunta
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- El comite preparatorio de la parte Norte, el grupo de planificacion para la promocion de la parte Sur y el comite preparatorio de la parte ultramarina para la Conferencia Conjunta de los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar para la paz y la reunificacion independiente de la Peninsula Coreana hicieron publico el dia 12 un comunicado conjunto que sigue:
					Tuvo lugar del 11 al 12 de agosto en Shenyang, China, la reunion de trabajo del comite preparatorio de la parte Norte, el grupo de planificacion para la promocion de la parte Sur y el comite preparatorio de la parte ultramarina para la Conferencia Conjunta de los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar para la paz y la reunificacion independiente de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Esta cita discutio francamente el rumbo de actividades inmediatas para posibilitar el gran acto pannacional por la reunificacion, y su mejor forma, la Conferencia Conjunta, propuestos por la parte Norte, y otros temas, tales como el acto conjunto nacional por el 71o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, el torneo de futbol de obreros del Norte y el Sur por la reunificacion y las reuniones de diferentes sectores para la misma empresa. 
					
					Los participantes coincidieron en que aunque no se pudo celebrar la Conferencia Conjunta, prevista con motivo del 71o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria de este ano, debido a las acciones obstruccionistas de las fuerzas internas y externas opositoras a la reunificacion, ella es el remedio mas racional y propuesta de gran significado historico para preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y buscar nueva salida para la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Como tarea inmediata, acordaron realizar ingentes esfuerzos por la apertura de la Conferencia Conjunta en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar y constituir el comite preparatorio pannacional cuando sea fundado el comite preparatorio de la parte Sur.
					
					Igualmente, decidieron dinamizar de diversas formas y metodos y conforme a la realidad las actividades para la apertura de la Conferencia Conjunta. 
					
					Las delegaciones de las partes Norte, Sur y Ultramar participantes en la reunion expresaron profunda preocupacion y lastima por la no apertura de la Conferencia Conjunta, los actos conjuntos nacionales por el 15 de agosto, el torneo de futbol de obreros del Norte y el Sur por la reunificacion, etc. debido a la desautorizacion de las autoridades surcoreanas, y decidieron dar auge a las actividades para normalizar los contactos y el intercambio de visitas entre las 3 partes. 
					
					Por ultimo, acordaron estrechar mas los contactos y consultas entre si para promover conforme a la aspiracion y demandas de la nacion coreana todos los problemas para realizar las reuniones y contactos por la reunificacion, inclusive la Conferencia Conjunta.
